long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Interval Refresher refreshes tabs that are at the webpages specified by the user at their desired interval. Sites and their corresponding intervals may be added or removed on the options page.

This extension is useful for people that need to refreshes pages consistently. For example if someone using a ticketing system that does not automatically update when new issues come in.

If you run into any issues with this extension please submit an issue on the github issue tracker.
https://github.com/stellan124/IntervalRefresher/issues
